name: Dorat Najd Resort
description: Dorat Najd Resort is ideally located in Riyadh few meters away of the King Salman Bin Abdulaziz & Al Wasseel Roads and it’s distinguished with its location, the majestic mountains and the beautiful gardens with private and public pools, Kids playgrounds, Fitness Center, SPA, large outdoor space encountered with Palm trees and Water Fountains and day lighted Meeting Rooms which makes our Resort a true oasis in the heart of the desert.

name: Long Flag In Diriyah
description: Long Flag In Diriyah is The flag of the Kingdom, in King Salman Square in Diriyah, is the largest flag of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia on the highest flagpole in the Kingdom. And the fifth in the world, as it has become a symbol and headquarters of national events, especially National Day.

name: Dim Light Restaurant
description: Dim Light Restaurant, as it is a restaurant and coffee with a very beautiful heritage décor that is useful at those times. You feel warm just by looking at the décor. It has indoor and outdoor sessions, a screen for watching matches, and an entrance for families, and it features the best ready-made drinks.

name: Shawarma Emperor
description: Enjoy savoring delicious shawarma and delicious broasted at Shawarma Emperor  Restaurant, along with a variety of fresh juices and appetizers.

name: Section B
description: Enjoy a wide selection of the most delicious types of burgers at Section B Restaurant.

name: PORTERHOUSE
description: PORTERHOUSE Restaurant Porter House is considered one of the best steak and meat restaurants in Riyadh. The restaurant is 100% Saudi. It was established in 2016. Children are only allowed until 7 pm.

name: Coyard
description: Enjoy a unique experience and taste the finest types of specialty coffee, hot and cold, at Coyard Cafe in Riyadh.

name: Veranda F&B
description: Veranda in the northern ring road, Al-Ghadeer neighborhood, has a variety of restaurants such as Topkapi, Tokyo and other restaurants, and it has a special café with its seating overlooking the fountain.

name: Cipriani Riyadh
description: Cipriani is an Italian restaurant, offers great service, nice taste and high-quality food with interior excellent atmosphere.

name: Al Hokair Time
description: Al Hokair Land is a theme park in the Saudi capital of Riyadh that opened to public in 1987.  Services at this park include mechanical thrill rides, video games, party rooms, ice rink, multi-dimension cinema, trampoline, and food & beverage section.

name: Doos karting
description: A large and safe car racing track awaits you at Doos Karting, where you can enjoy a perfect and fun experience with friends and family.

name: Riyadh Season
description: Riyadh Season is a state-sponsored annual entertainment and sports festival, part of the larger Saudi Seasons initiative held from October to March during winter since 2019 in Riyadh.

name: Texas Roadhouse
description: Texas Roadhouse is an American restaurant that opened on February 17, 1993 by Kent Taylor and was the first branch in Clarksville, Indiana, USA. Texas Roadhouse serves a variety of meals such as steak, chicken and seafood, in addition to delicious fresh Roadhouse bread.

name: Tokyo
description: Tokyo Restaurant in Riyadh is a destination that combines Japanese authenticity and innovation. You will feel that you are on a trip to Japan once you taste the special dishes served by professional chefs.

name: Cello
description: Cello is located on, Northern Ring Road, A Nakheel district. It is a classy lounge with dramatic interior design, high quality food with great taste and welcoming staff.

name: Billionaire
description: You can enjoy unique dishes at Billionaire Restaurant in Riyadh, which takes you on a journey to a luxurious and refined dining experience, served by a staff that pays attention to details.

name: Chuck E Cheese's
description: Chuck E. Cheese Riyadh is one of the most important amusement parks in Riyadh that provide a range of exciting and entertaining games that suit different ages.

name: Black Stamp
description: Black Stamp, Address: Exit 6, Abi Bakr Al-Siddiq Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, one of Riyadh's cafes, serving the best drinks, and the place is clean and wonderful, serving hot and cold drinks at the best service and prices are reasonable, so they only compensate for the menu inside the cafe, and it is Two floors, and there are indoor and outdoor seating, and there is a corner for smokers and families as well, and there is a home delivery service and there is quiet music, so we offer you the menu with prices, number and address below the article, working hours from 6:30 am to 10:30 pm.

name: Wadi Namar
description: An open park located south of the Saudi capital, Riyadh, and is one of the most famous and most attractive tourist attractions for visitors and tourists in the capital, Riyadh. The park, contains the Namar Dam lake, which is two kilometers long, an area of 200,000 square meters, and a depth of about 20 meters. In softening the atmosphere of the park, and their contribution to reviving the wildlife around it.

name: Yukari
description: At Yokari, will experience a modern fine dining Japanese restaurant, utilizing the best products and incorporating luxury food ingredients.

name: Sky Zone
description: Sky Zone is the destination for family and friends for fun-filled times and games, within an entertainment center that includes a wide range of games and entertainment activities.

name: Kuzam karting
description: Kuzam karting is a road racing four-wheel of multiple level game, nice and enjoyable for professional player. A challenging 700-meter karting track filled with exciting bends, and high-speed corners

name: Chili's
description: As part of the famous Chili's restaurant chain, it offers the best of American and Mexican cuisine, enjoyed by both children and families.

name: Almaigliah Market
description: Almaigliah Market in downtown Riyadh, a market for major suppliers of clothing, oriental perfumes, oud, and traditional men's clothing.

name: Mille Feuille Bakery
description: Mille Feuille Bakery gives you an amazing opportunity to taste a unique selection of pastries with delicious fillings, in addition to oriental sweets and baked goods.

name: Salt U-Walk
description: Enjoy the distinctive flavors of fast food at Salt U Walk Restaurant, with a varied and delicious menu and refreshing drinks, in a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere.

name: Mama Noura
description: Mama Noura is your destination to savor the most delicious oriental and Arabic food in Riyadh, with dishes that reflect the distinctive and authentic taste of traditional Arabic food.

name: Laffa
description: Laffa restaurant offers a unique experience to its visitors amidst the elegance of its decor, starting with breakfast dishes and fresh pastries and ending with hot and cold cups of coffee.

name: Starbucks
description: Starbucks coffee shops are known as the best places to sell coffee in the world, providing customers with a wide selection of hot and cold drinks in a comfortable and calm environment to drink, among the best-selling beverage options in Starbucks cafes are cappuccino, latte, french vanilla, caramel, and ice coffee, which you must try while you are in any of the agencies of this international chain, but what distinguishes Starbucks Café in Riyadh is the luxurious decoration of the place and its distinctive location in a very lively area.

name: Last Hour Escape Room
description: Last Hour Escape Room is a new form of entertainment called escape games that stimulate the adrenaline and provide an unparalleled entertainment experience.

name: Al Waha Park
description: Al Waha Park is famous for its attraction and green gardens, there are many options for individuals and group outdoor games for children and families.

name: Koi Japanese
description: Koi is a Japanese restaurant that offers great taste, elegant service, high quality menu and luxurious surroundings.

name: Suhail
description: Suhail restaurent is a high-end Saudi Arabian dining concept combining tradition with luxury. It serves traditional home-style food that revives the authentic taste.

name: Al Safat Square (Justice Square)
description: Al Safat Square, also known as Deera Square, is the main square of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The square contains a big open market area and a few surrounding coffee shops. Many national celebrations are held in this square. It also connects the two major historical sites of Riyadh: the Al Masmak Palace Museum on the east end and the Grand Mosque on the west end.

name: Sultan's Steakhouse Riyadh
description: Sultan Steakhouse Restaurant offers its customers a choice of kofta and steak made from fresh meat. It features a lively atmosphere to complement the taste of pleasure.

name: Karam Beirut
description: Karam Beirut is a Lebanese restaurant that offers Lebanese menu with choices, plentiful dishes, outstanding tasty food and high quality service.

name: Ushaiqer Heritage Village
description: Ushaiqer Heritage Village is located in the heart of Najd, on an area of oases 200 km northwest of Riyadh, and reflects the spirit of the originality and nobility of the Saudi society. Bedouins settled there for the first time 1500 years ago, and soon its architecture grew and its structure developed it became a famous stopping point for caravans of pilgrims heading to Mecca, for its beautiful pools, orchards, and palm trees.

name: Falla - U WALK
description: Falla - U WALK is one of the Dubai restaurants that opened a branch in Riyadh, where their first branch was opened in Riyadh in the U Walk complex in February of the year 2020. Their main branch is in Dubai City Walk. A large U Walk branch, for individuals and families, indoor and outdoor seating.

name: Imam Turki bin Abdullah Grand Mosque
description: Imam Turki bin Abdullah Grand Mosque is known as the Great Mosque, the most famous and oldest mosque in Riyadh. The historical sources did not specify the year of construction of the mosque, but it is likely that it was between 1241 AH to 1245 AH. The Saudi state’s care of the mosque continued until the modern era, when a new building was created for the mosque with the follow-up and support of the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques, King Salman bin Abdulaziz, when he was governor of the Riyadh region.

name: Elite Cup
description: Elite Cup Roastery Café is one of the best cafés in Riyadh in the quality of latte and coffee in general. The menu of drinks at the café includes many hot and cold drinks, such as cappuccino, latte, and macchiato. The café is distinguished by its elegant and wonderful decor, and the café provides comfortable indoor and outdoor seating for visitors.

name: Ascott Rafal Olaya Riyadh
description: The Ascott Rafal Olaya Hotel Apartments Riyadh is located between two of the tallest skyscrapers in the city, which not only offers guests an exceptional view of the city, but also provides useful orientation points to Al Faisaliah Tower and Kingdom Center.

name: Munch Bakery
description: Munch Bakery, are sweets with a delicious and different character, if you are looking for a wonderful and distinctive taste, do not hesitate to taste Munch sweets. Munch Sweets aims to produce sweets with a character that attracts all customers to gather family and family members with joy and happiness through the experience and tasting of delicious foods and sweets that are loved by the whole family in all its stages.

name: Em Sherif
description: In Em Sherif Cafe, you can enjoy with family and friends the wonderful atmosphere and vast spaces. It serves a wide range of hot and cold drinks, light snacks and desserts.

name: Chai and Chapati
description: In a warm and intimate atmosphere, you can savor the most delicious dishes inspired by Arab and Asian cuisine in the Chai and Chapati Restaurant and Cafe, with a wide range of hot and cold drinks.

address: Uthman Ibn Affan Rd, King Abdullah Dt., Riyadh 12451, Saudi Arabia
name: The Meat Shop
description: On Othman Bin Affan Road in Riyadh, discover The Meat Shop, one of the best stores selling fresh meat, featuring delicious burgers and steaks.

name: Rafa (Hotel)
description: Rafa, located in Riyadh, offers self-catering accommodation and free WiFi. The property is 7.0 km from Kingdom Center and 9.0 km from Al Faisaliah Tower. Guests can shop at Al Nakheel Shopping Mall which is a 5-minute drive from Rafa. King Khalid International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.There is a 24-hour front desk, and other facilities such as grocery delivery, a shared lounge and luggage storage are available.

name: Nofa Riyadh(Radisson collection)
description: Explore the rich culture of Riyadh at Nova Resort, which introduces you to local experiences and exciting adventures alongside luxurious accommodations, swimming pools and an amazing safari park.

name: 9th Street
description: 9th Street Café, a Saudi coffee shop and roaster established in 2019 with high standards of quality and accuracy. We are working to advance what we offer, preparing the finest coffee.

name: Heet Cave
description: Located about 50 km from Riyadh, Heet Cave, Ein Heet or Dahl Heet is a natural cave popular among tourists worldwide. It is present on the Al Kharj road and is famous for limestone rocks and water reservoir. It also features a natural water reservoir that attracts adventure enthusiasts from all over the world.

name: Souq Al Zel
description: Souq Al Zel and Al Mashaleh is very famous and attracts large numbers of tourists, as it is the oldest traditional market in Riyadh and includes in its historical alleys a large number of shops selling traditional men's and women's clothing, and the traditional shoemaking by hand.

name: Naila Art Gallery
description: Great art gallery, staff very friendly and organised. They host exhibitions regularly.

name: Five Guys
description: Five Guys Restaurant was established in 1986. The first branch was in the Orlington Westmont Shopping Center, the baked goods were baked in the same place by Brenners Bakeries. The menu of the Five Guys restaurant chain includes several foods, including beef, French fries and pork, and it offers soft drinks.

name: Mekado House
description: Mikado house is Turkish restaurant, good varieties of Turkish dishes and grills, serves tasty and delicious dishes with fresh hot bread, professional skilled staff.

name: King Fahad National Library
description: Is the legal deposit and copyright library for Saudi Arabia. KFNL was established in 1983 in response to an initiative made by the people of Riyadh when King Fahd ascended the throne. The project was announced in 1983 and the implementation started in 1986. Now to this day, the library is known for its sustainability and up-to-date energy concepts.

name: U WALK by Arabian Centres
description: A huge open plaza with multiple selections of restaurants and cafes, It's a must visit spot in Riyadh, best time to visit is day time, Always you will find a new place to discover. Also, have a male/female gym, shops, cinema,  bowling, and walking hall

name: Saqer-Aljazirah Royal Saudi Air Force Aviation Museum
description: Saqer-Aljazirah Royal Saudi Air Force Aviation Museum narrates the historical development of the Royal Saudi Air Force since its inception at the hands of King Abdul Aziz to what it has reached in this era.

name: Le Moulin Bakery
description: Le Moulin Bakery greets visitors with the scent of freshly baked goods and offers them a variety of cakes, croissants and delicious desserts.

name: Dilli
description: Dilli Restaurant is famous for its finest of Indian cuisine, serves the most authentic North Indian food, original flavor, great taste with nice atmosphere and good serice.

name: King Abdulaziz camel festival
description: The King Abdul-Aziz Festival for Camels is an annual cultural, economic, sports and entertainment festival in Saudi Arabia under royal patronage. It aims to consolidate and strengthen the camel heritage in the Saudi, Arab and Islamic culture and provide a cultural, tourist, sports, leisure and economic destination for camels and their heritage

name: Leila min Lebanon
description: Leila min Lebanon restaurant is a real traditional Lebanese cuisine, serving the most flavorful dishes, great taste and decorative interior.

name: Amo Hamza
description: Amo Hamza is one of the best sea food restaurant in Riyadh. A variety dishes sea food, seafood soup and grills, with excellent taste.

name: King Saud’s Red Palace
description: The Red Palace is a historical palace and the first buildings built with concrete and reinforced iron in the city of Riyadh. It was built in 1942 AD to be a residence for Prince Saud bin Abdulaziz and his family after the burning of his palace in the square, and a council to receive the Kingdom’s guests from the leaders and rulers of countries, and it is the first seat of the Council of Ministers since its establishment Until 1988.

name: King Salman Social Center
description: Well-equipped community center for ladies, including well-maintained swimming pools, gym, fitness studio, library, café and meeting rooms.

name: Snow Forest
description: Snowy Forest  (Amusement park) is located on Al sahaba branch Road in Riyadh, that offers an incredible range of fun rides, kids' games and attractions.

name: Amai Japanese Bakery
description: Amai Bakery is inspired by the traditional Japanese taste, and features a varied menu of delicious baked goods and beverages.

name: Burger Boutique Al Olaya
description: With its modern and elegant decor, Burger Boutique offers a wonderful destination for burger lovers in Riyadh, a variety of delicious and distinctive dishes.

name: Ruhi
description: Within The Zone, you can savor the best Indian cuisine at Ruhi Restaurant, with a wide variety of authentic Indian flavors at the hands of professional chefs.

name: Cafe Bateel
description: The Cafe Bateel is clean, excellently maintained with a fine ambience and really helpful waiting staff, and a great selection of breakfast options.

name: Goot
description: Goot Hotel Resorts, With its dazzling design and elegant architecture, Goot Resorts sets new standards in the world of luxury hotel experiences, whether you prefer to spend time relaxing in our pools, enjoying our wonderful atmosphere, or relaxing and rejuvenating, we are sure that you will never find us like it, visit Quot Hotel Resorts Where we exceed all your expectations for luxury resorts, our hotel resorts are the most unique and luxurious in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, each villa is equipped and designed with inspiration, luxury and prestige to embody the highest standards of high-end living.

name: Mirage
description: A unique destination loved by family and friends, and delicious dishes are served professionally from the Chinese cuisine at Mirage Restaurant in Riyadh.

name: Quetzal Aparthotel
description: Quetzal Aparthotel Hotel, located in Riyadh, offers accommodations with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a fitness room. The property is air-conditioned and has a sauna. Quetzal Hotel Apartments is 4.1 km away From Al Nakheel Mall and 6 km from Saqr Al-Jazira Aviation Museum. The nearest airport is King Khalid Airport, 25 km away.

name: Al Masmak Fortress
description: Also called the Masmak Fortress or Masmak Palace, is a clay and mudbrick fort in ad-Dirah, Riyadh. Built in 1865 for prince 'Abdurrahman. Since 1995, the fortress has been converted into a museum showcasing one of the most important landmarks of Saudi heritage.

name: Escape the Room
description: Escape the Room center offers real life adventure game, fun, new entertainment concept.

name: Al Ajlan Art Gallery
description: One of the best art shows in Riyadh, the collection of Arabic calligraphy is unique.

name: Hlewa Heritage Market
description: Hlewa Heritage Market is considered one of the most important heritage markets in Shaqra Governorate, located in the Riyadh region. It was built in 1350 AH - 1931 AD. It consists of a spacious area that reflects an accurate image of its commercial position in the Arabian Peninsula. It also includes a group of stores specialized in selling household items, textiles, gifts, souvenirs and others, in addition to a distinctive heritage museum, library and an outdoor café suitable for sipping a cup of coffee with family or friends.

name: OKTO
description: OKTO (meaning "eight in Greek") opened in 2019 as part of a subsidiary project for the already successful family-owned construction company. Today, this thriving restaurant, inspired by a visit by two of the four founding members of Greece, has witnessed incredible success and raised the bar for the Greek game in Riyadh with its unique and creative menu.

name: The Cheesecake Factory
description: The Cheesecake Factory restaurants are known for their rich and varied menu of over 250 items made with the freshest ingredients, as well as a selection of desserts including over 30 cheesecakes and other specials such as Oreo Dream Extreme cheesecake, Ultimate Red Velvet Cheesecake, and Linda's Fudge Cake. We have a variety of delicious flavors that will satisfy all tastes no matter what you are looking for.

name: At-Turaif District
description: At-Turaif district in Diriyah was included in the UNESCO World Heritage List. In this district, we travel through time and bear witness of the turning points in the history of Saudi Arabia, when Diriyah was the capital of the first Saudi state, and the home of merchants in the Arabian Peninsula.

name: Albujairi Terrace
description: Where civilization meets fragrant history, Albujairi Terrace welcomes you with distinctive destinations.

name: Aseel Resort
description: Aseel Resort is one of the best historical heritages, as the unique Aseel Resort is located in the historical and remote area of ​​Diriyah in Saudi Arabia. This special outlet was designed to be a tribute to the ancient history of the Kingdom and the beautiful art of Najd, and today, we present it to you.

name: Millle Feuille
description: If you are a fan of pastries and sweets, Millle Feuille Restaurant is the best place to make fresh pastes, where the best types of handmade baked goods, cakes, and biscuits are in Millle Feuille.

name: Awj Chalets
description: Awj Chalets are one of the best places to stay in peace and have become more like luxury apartments, with superb hotel services, integrated to provide guests with a comfortable stay, in a welcoming and luxurious atmosphere, to be Awj's first choice for families for recreation and entertainment.

name: Jax District
description: Jax district in Diriyah brings together elite artists and amateurs. With their art, they embody the meanings of life through color formations –which highlight each artist’s state and imagination, that spread in corridors filled with endless visual and sensory delight.

name: Spin Bike Rentals
description: Spin Bike Rentals is one of the best places to set up strong cycling courses and it has a coffee place there.

name: Military museum
description: It reviews the military aspect of the history of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, including war tools, battles in the past, and fortifications designed by Saudi warriors in the Diriyah region.

name: Salwa Palace
description: In Salwa Palace, which extends over an area of 10,000 square meters and is full of heritage monuments, you can feel the fragrance of the past in the most famous and largest historical monuments in Diriyah.

name: Sultan Restaurant and Kitchen
description: Sultan Restaurant and Kitchen is one of the best restaurants in Diriyah, offering the best traditional Saudi and Yemeni dishes (local and travel), grills, meat of all kinds, and sandwiches throughout the day and night. Cleanliness is excellent and the staff is excellent and professional. Treated with utmost beauty and respect.

name: Arabian horse museum
description: To explore the history of the Arabian horse and its relationship with princes and knights throughout history, go to the Museum of Arabian Horses and learn about the purebred Arabian horse breeds and passports of horses that had a long history in wars, daily life, sports and travel. In front of the museum stands a purebred Arabian horse that visitors can view as a sample of those horses.

name: Wagyu burger
description: Enjoy the delicious taste of American dishes at Wagyu Burger Restaurant in Riyadh, with a rich menu prepared with the finest types of meat.

name: Tameesa
description: Tameesa Restaurant receives its visitors very early in the morning to eat the most delicious traditional breakfast dishes and enjoy an authentic taste of foul and magalgal, along with a pot of tea and freshly baked Tamees bread.

name: Magnolia Bakery
description: An American café and bakery serving all kinds of coffee, some baked goods, cakes and pies. It is located in Sub-Takhassusi, Al-Muhammadiyah, Riyadh 12364, Saudi Arabia.

name: Elixir Bunn
description: At Elixir Bunn Cafe, your experience is not limited to just enjoying fresh coffee, but it also extends to purchasing the finest imported ground coffee from around the world from the cafe's shelves.

name: Curve Roastery
description: Coffee beans harvested from high mountains around the world are prepared by expert hands at Curve Roastery and Cafe, where caffeine doses and delicious assortments of pastries and fresh baked goods are served.

name: Murabba Historical Palace
description: The Square Palace is one of the historic buildings in Al Murabba, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The palace is the first building that was erected outside the walls of the old city.[1] It was named after its square with the form of 400 by 400 metres (1,300 by 1,300 ft). It is one of the museums in the city.

name: Wadi Hanifah
description: Is a valley in the Najd region, Riyadh Province. The valley runs for a length of 120 km from northwest to southeast, cutting through the city of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. A string of towns and villages lie along the valley, including Uyaynah, Irqah and Diriyah. The historical city of Riyadh itself is on the northeastern side of the valley, but the city has now expanded across Wadi Hanifa, with the sub-municipalities of Al-Shifa and Al-Urayja on its southwestern side.

name: The Zone
description: The site hosts the well-known high-end restaurants The Zone Riyadh, such as Karak Golam, Luqmat Riyadh Restaurant, Katch Restaurant and others. We present this article in your hands as a complete guide to the best and most important restaurants and shops of The Zone in Riyadh.

name: Boulevard Riyadh City
description: The largest entertainment area in the capital city of Saudi Arabia, with lots of virtual reality game experiences as well as international and local stores, in addition to numerous cultural theatres.

name: Kashounat Al Bait
description: Kashounat Al Bait Restaurant is characterized by its spaciousness and variety of sessions. It is also unique in its varied menu and highly professionally prepared dishes, including grills and cold and hot appetizers.

name: Catch22
description: Catch 22 Restaurant in Riyadh is a unique destination for American dining, with a wonderful design and atmosphere and indoor and outdoor seating areas to enjoy the most delicious meals.

name: Najd Village
description: The Najd Village Restaurant presents the concept of rich and varied Najd cuisine in its authentic style, in a traditional atmosphere that takes you back to the beauty of the past.

name: Red Sand Dunes
description: Visiting the Red Sand Dunes is an adventure full of beauty, excitement, and suspense, as it enjoys an enchanting natural beauty that catches the eye and is ideal for taking unparalleled souvenir photos. It is one of the most beautiful natural areas in Riyadh and provides the opportunity for everyone who visits it to practice a variety of outdoor activities such as sandboarding, desert biking, and others.

name: Kingdom Centre
description: The Kingdom Tower in Riyadh is the most prominent and famous building in the city. It is also one of the tallest towers in the country, with a length of 300 meters, and a total area of ​​about 300,000 square meters. It is considered one of the most important tourist places in Riyadh.

name: Rawdhat Al Kharara
description: This is the area known as Red Sands. Visit here when the day starts to cool a bit. This area South West of Riyadh is where you will find camels roaming free and people enjoying the freedom to drive their 4x4s. Watch the sun set over distant mountains

name: Swalief Al Dira
description: Swalif Deira Restaurant offers delicious popular dishes with the character of the beautiful and heritage place, specially created to serve traditional hospitality.

name: National Museum
description: You can see the masterpieces of artifacts in the National Museum in Riyadh, with a unique architectural design that combines traditional and modern styles.

name: Taibah Market
description: One of the oldest markets in Riyadh where you can find almost everything you want at a very good price. The location is perfect, the variety is great and the prices are accessible.

name: Al Nakheel Mall
description: Fashionable mall with high-end global brands, a food court, fountains & a kids' play attraction. This mall offers everything from jewelry and accessories to the perfect perfume or latest eyewear.

name: Camel Step
description: Camel step, camel step café serves beautiful and wonderful types of coffee and hot coffee, as well as roasted and ground coffee is also available, of course for lovers of good taste.

name: Granada Mall
description: Granada Mall is a shopping mall located in the eastern ring road Ghernata District in Riyadh, One of the biggest and most crowded malls, wide verities of shops, very nice food court and very near to city center.

name: Sulalat Coffee
description: Sulalat Coffee, the Saudi Specialty Coffee Roastery, the first luxury coffee roaster in the Kingdom, located at 2329 Makkah Al Mukarramah Branch Road, Al Rabwah, Riyadh 12821, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

name: Edge of the world
description: The Edge of the World (Jebel Fihrayn) is an unexpected and dramatic geological wonder in the rocky desert northwest of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The site earned its nickname because from atop the escarpment, you have an uninterrupted view of the horizon.

name: Al Bujairi Heritage Park
description: Al Bujairi Heritage Park in Riyadh is one of the most ancient parks in the capital city, as it combines its design and construction between the past and the present in a distinguished architectural form.

name: Gurkan Sef
description: Gurkan Sef restaurant is located at Takhassousi road, Al Mohammadiyyah district, nice place for the Turkish dishes, great taste, busy place, welcoming staff, serves high class dessert and tea at dinner.

name: Riyadh Oasis
description: Riyadh Oaiss returned to its most beautiful appearance in early 2022 AD, and now includes shops, restaurants, concerts, and even sports, including bowling, archery, golf, and horse riding.

name: Thumamah National Park
description: Thumamah National Park Park is the best place for desert activities such as cycling and safaris. You can enjoy the breathtaking view of the sunset and spend wonderful nights.

name: Nofa Safari
description: Nofa Safari wildlife Park is home to a plethora of animals including zebra, giraffe, leopards, and more, which you can't easily see anywhere else. The park is considered one of the most important tourist and educational facilities in Riyadh.

name: Riyadh Front - Shopping Area
description: Riyadh Front is an extraordinary urban experience that re-imagines how we Work. Play. Dine. Shop and share space in the heart of Riyadh. Integrating human-centered design and social spaces, Riyadh Front isn't just a place - it's a living hub of Connection. Curiosity and Innovation.

name: Addoho Neighborhood
description: On the eastern side of Wadi Hanifa, southwest of the Palace of Government, Addoho Neighborhood has been standing tall for 200 years in the Saudi capital, Riyadh. It is the last remaining neighborhood of old Riyadh.

name: Riyadh Park
description: The Riyadh Park is a shopping mall in Riyadh, it provides a unique shopping and entertainment experience, it is designed to be an unparalleled shopping, entertainment, and leisure destination in the Kingdom.

name: Cova
description: Creating feasts for the eyes and mouth since 1817, Cova is one of Italy's oldest pasticceria, famed for its artisanal pastries, teas, and cuisine.

name: Tatel
description: Described as one of the top restaurants in the world worth flying for, Tatel is a global ambassador of Spanish cuisine and culture to the world.

name: Long Chim
description: Long Chim offers a Michelin-starred take on the fresh and fragrant comfort food served in street markets throughout bustling Bangkok

name: Somewhere
description: Somewhere offers a mix of contemporary and international dishes infused with authentic ingredients and flavours from Saudi Arabia to the Mediterranean

name: Brunch & Cake
description: Traditional dishes made with love, Brunch & Cake’s wholesome organic ingredients, delectable dishes, and exquisite interiors are a treat for the tastebuds and the eyes

name: Maiz
description: MAIZ is a new fine-dining concept that celebrates the Kingdom’s cuisine by combining regional Saudi dishes with contemporary flair in an authentically Arabian setting

name: Flamingo Room
description: Inspired by African Glamour, Flamingo Room by tashas is the epitome of old school dining with a contemporary twist. Our predominantly seafood menu reflects a commitment to quality ingredients and showcases an impressive variety of revamped classics and glamorous dishes, bursting with seasonal flavours

name: Sum+Things
description: The latest concept from Dubai-based celebrity chef Izu Ani, Sum+ Things combines all-day dining with contemporary, design-led retail. Whatever your fancy, take your pick.

name: Sarabeth’s
description: Whether its breakfast, lunch, dinner, or brunch, visit Sarabeth’s for the authentic flavors of New York City, from pancakes and French toast to burgers, pasta, and salads.

name: Altopiano
description: Altopiano adds a dash of innovation to the humble ingredients and age-old techniques of a traditional Italian home-cooked meal to create dishes that are simply unforgettable.

name: Café de L'esplanade
description: Luxurious French brasserie dining of the highest order, Café de L'esplanade serves its dishes with unmistakably Parisian flair

name: Takya
description: Takya will take you on a culinary tour through the diversity of Saudi cuisine while fusing traditional local dishes with the finest international ingredients and flavors

name: Hakkasan
description: Michelin-starred, authentic Cantonese cuisine, Hakkasan marries traditional techniques with contemporary flair and spectacular plating and presentation.

name: Kingdom Arena
description: Able to accommodate more than 40,000 people, this venue hosts concerts and more!

name: Rawdat Tinhat
description: The largest natural meadow in Saudi Arabia, the location, beauty landmarks and possible activities.

name: Good Food
description: Good Food is a casual café inspired by the traditional pastry. Good Food serves an exciting re-interpretation of the classic Chimney Cake with a modern twist.

name: Jones the Grocer
description: Jones the Grocer, a cafe and restaurant, has an upscale market with gourmet groceries and a cafe serving global food with an Australian twist.

name: BillyBeez- AlHamra Mall
description: Billy Beez is an ultimate indoor entertainment playground in mall settings, for kids aged 3-12 years offering a variety of features, from slides of trampolines, tunnels of towers. It is one of a kind soft play adventure land that sets of the standard in providing safe, healthy and most important providing fun, entertainment for children and family bonding.

name: Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib - Al Takhassusi Hospital
description: Al Takhassusi Hospital one of the largest healthcare facilities, as it has the largest centers of specialization for heart surgeries, equipped with the latest and most advanced technologies. And committed to delivering top-quality healthcare services for all medical specialties.

name: BillyBeez- Tala Mall
description: Billy Beez is an ultimate indoor entertainment playground in mall settings, for kids aged 3-12 years offering a variety of features, from slides of trampolines, tunnels of towers. It is one of a kind soft play adventure land that sets of the standard in providing safe, healthy and most important providing fun, entertainment for children and family bonding.

name: Toby's Estate
description: At Toby's Estate, the focus is on sourcing high-quality coffee beans from various regions, ensuring a rich and diverse flavor profile in every cup. The menu extends beyond traditional coffee options to include a variety of artisanal teas, delectable pastries, and delicious treats.

name: Bob's Famous- AlNakheel Mall
description: Bob’s Famous is a restaurant and bowling center rolled up in a fun retro style concept for the whole family. It features multiple food and beverages, bowling lanes, easy automatic scoring, bumper lanes, rest areas and much more. Suitable for all ages and skill levels. Whether you want to eat, bowl, or just chill with your friends, Bob’s famous is the ideal hangout for you.

name: Black Tap
description: This is the first branch of the famous New York burger chain in the Saudi capital, Riyadh, and will provide customers its famous burgers and amazing milkshakes. The Riyadh branch will feature the lively atmosphere found in similar branches around the world, including neon signs, graffiti art, not to mention delicious food and a trendy music list.

name: Bob's Famous- Boulevard Riyadh City
description: Bob’s Famous is a restaurant and bowling center rolled up in a fun retro style concept for the whole family. It features multiple food and beverages, bowling lanes, easy automatic scoring, bumper lanes, rest areas and much more. Suitable for all ages and skill levels. Whether you want to eat, bowl, or just chill with your friends, Bob’s famous is the ideal hangout for you.

name: Café Tale
description: Cafe Tale is built to create meaningful experiences for local communities through quality products, innovation and an ever evolving vision. Each branch is designed as a welcoming space that brings diverse people together.

name: 12 CUPS
description: The first coffee provider in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia that allows customers to choose different coffee blends and preparation methods to find sweetness, aroma, acidity and flavor. The café shares knowledge and expertise to educate customers using the “one cup at a time” philosophy, which has already influenced many other local restaurants to adopt this idea.

name: SPACCA
description: Nothing expresses summer more than our smoked flavors! As the temperature rises, so does our excitement In presenting you with a dinner summer set menu, showcasing our famous grilled dishes with an Italian touch at a lean price.

name: Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib - AL Sweidi Hospital
description: Al Suwaidi Hospital is the first in the Saudi Arabia is at the forefront of digital innovation, using eleCTAonic systems throughout the entire patient journey. It offers healthcare services for all medical specialties, ensuring patients receive top-quality care from admission to discharge. Its commitment to digitization makes it a leader in the region

name: Trieste
description: Trieste Cafe offers an extensive menu featuring delectable breakfast options, enticing desserts, and flavorful sandwiches. Indulge in their offerings, including favorites like the Spicy Tuna Sandwich, Tartina Avocado, Classic Egg Bun, and the famous French Toast.

name: Al Faisaliah Tower
description: Whether this is your first visit to Riyadh, or you are into adrenaline-pumping activities, you will love seeing a panoramic view of the city. At the top of Al Faisaliah Tower, it is true to say that you can catch the most beautiful views of the city in the restaurants that overlook it

name: Bob's Famous- The view mall

It features multiple food and beverages, bowling lanes, easy automatic scoring, bumper lanes, rest areas and much more. Suitable for all ages and skill levels. Whether you want to eat, bowl, or just chill with your friends, Bob’s famous is the ideal hangout for you.

name: Boulevard City
description: A must-see, this area includes gardens, a dancing fountain, food and shops, plus the largest cinema in Saudi!

name: Starbucks
description: Starbucks offers you delicious, handcrafted beverages and great-tasting snacks made from high-quality ingredients. The art of preparing coffee is our first passion, as well as everything we do, so you can enjoy a pleasant tasting experience at Starbucks wherever you are.

name: Roshn Front
description: Witness innovative design, which reimagines the future of the workplace.

name: EL Camino
description: El Camino serves authentic Mexican cuisine in a vibrant atmosphere, the restaurant is beautifully decorated with Mexican decorations and artworks. Their menu offers a wide range of delicious authentic Mexican cuisine.

name: Bob's Famous- Hayat Mall
description: Bob’s Famous is a restaurant and bowling center rolled up in a fun retro style concept for the whole family. It features multiple food and beverages, bowling lanes, easy automatic scoring, bumper lanes, rest areas and much more. Suitable for all ages and skill levels. Whether you want to eat, bowl, or just chill with your friends, Bob’s famous is the ideal hangout for you.

name: Sala Hub
description: Sala Hub is an indoor amusement park with fun rides, arcade games, group games, variety of electric games. You can also host a party there in their designated party rooms, entertained by their mascots and themed event days. Family will be entertained for hours!

name: Ramla Terraza
description: Please your palate at Clap, Iris Café, Brute or Jones the Grocer -- all offer upscale eats.

It is one of a kind soft play adventure land that sets of the standard in providing safe, healthy and most important providing fun, entertainment for children and family bonding.

name: Noug
description:
The people of Saudi Arabia share a deep bond with camel milk, a vital staple abundant in nutrients essential for human well-being. 
Noug strategically expanded its branches across key locations in the Kingdom, aiming to fortify the longstanding bond between camels and the Saudi populace while also ensuring citizens have easier access to fresh, natural camel milk products.

name: Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib - Olaya Medical Complex
description: Olaya Medical Complex offers exceptional healthcare services to its patients for over two decades. The complex stands out as the largest integrated medical complex in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

name: Raoul's
description: We are bringing New York's magic to your plate! With our special summer set menus Offering Raoul’s iconic dishes at an affordable price! And if you’re craving a taste of our famous New York brunch, our new set menus await from Thursday to Saturday. All this at an affordable price.

It features multiple food and beverages, bowling lanes, easy automatic scoring, bumper lanes, rest areas and much more. Suitable for all ages and skill levels. Whether you want to eat, bowl, or just chill with your friends, Bob’s famous is the ideal hangout for you.

name: Monopoly
description: Monopoly Restaurant is a fine dining restaurant that serves authentic Italian food. The restaurant is lavishly furnished with classic Italian style. They serve a wide variety of authentic Italian dishes such as Pera la vino Salad, Burrata Ravioli, Margherita Pizza, and much more. They also have an amazing selection of drinks, desserts and coffee.

name: Bob's Famous- U walk
description: Bob’s Famous is a restaurant and bowling center rolled up in a fun retro style concept for the whole family. It features multiple food and beverages, bowling lanes, easy automatic scoring, bumper lanes, rest areas and much more. Suitable for all ages and skill levels. Whether you want to eat, bowl, or just chill with your friends, Bob’s famous is the ideal hangout for you.

name: Urth Café
description: Since Earth Café was established in 1989, it has been striving to provide the best and finest culinary experiences to customers. Our ultimate goal is to captivate the hearts, minds and senses of our customers by maintaining a unique and unique level of quality and ethics, and the hump of that is providing the best tasting foods and the finest organic coffees and teas from all over the world. The essence of our philosophy lies in making our customers happy by putting purity

name: Chalmont
description: Chalmont is an upscale fine dining French restaurant. They provide an extensive range of delicious authentic French cuisine including Burrata salad, Crispy Duck Croquette, ‏Black Angus Ribeye, ‏Sea food Tagliatelle and Crème Brûlée.

name: Pistrina Bakery
description: Pistrina Bakery is the ideal destination for those who seek high quality baked goods and premium coffee. Enjoy Pistrina Bakery’s products in a comfortable atmosphere and stunning views of KAFD buildings.

name: SalaLasertag- Park avenue
description: Join a new fun experience, unleash your inner warrior and challenge your friends to a laser battle at Sala Lasertag! Enter an interactive arena full of thrills and live action fun in a high-tech laser tag adventure. Earn the highest amount of points and win the battle.

name: Sky Bridge at Kingdom Center
description: From a height of 300 meters in the sky of Riyadh, take in a stunning panoramic view of the beauty of the city through highly secure glass panels. These panels let you enjoy the view of the starry nights and contemplate the yellow lights reflected on the streets and buildings of Riyadh from the Sky Bridge. Another way to seize the moment is by taking selfies where the glamour of the city is behind you on a clear day.

name: Riyadh Golf Club
description:
Riyadh Golf Club is located just 20 minutes from Central Riyadh, showcasing a whole host of fantastic golf and leisure facilities.
Whether you are looking to play a round of golf, have a bite to eat, or use our sports facilities, our venue provides the perfect setting for families, groups of friends and business acquaintances.

name: Draft Café
description: Draft café offers a unique experience in mastering the standards of coffee to its visitors with practical and enjoyable spaces. It provides an environment that stimulates inspiration and invites you to be positive in all aspects of the place.

name: SCOTT'S
description: Savor the taste join us on a culinary adventure of flavors with our exclusive summer lunch and dinner set menu, showcasing Scott’s signature dishes, all at a reduced price

name: SalaLasertag - AlHamra Mall
description: Join a new fun experience, unleash your inner warrior and challenge your friends to a laser battle at Sala Lasertag! Enter an interactive arena full of thrills and live action fun in a high-tech laser tag adventure. Earn the highest amount of points and win the battle.

name: Riyadh Wing
description: A flying tour of 15 km, accompanied by the most skilled pilots and trainers, and is available for all ages from the age of 10 years and a weight not exceeding 120 kg.

name: IL Barreto
description: From London to Riyadh, the international restaurant Al Baretto is one of the classic Italian restaurants known in Britain, Il Baretto is a fine Italian restaurant serving authentic Italian cuisine. The restaurant is furnished to luxurious standards in classic European style and distinctive design elements create an intimate atmosphere. It consists of beautiful indoor and outdoor seating overlooking the KAFD skyscrapers. They serve a variety of authentic Italian dishes.

name: Abstract Art Gallery
description: The Abstract Art Gallery connects between the artist and the audience, as it hosts local art pioneers and provides a space to display their work. Cultural and popular legacies appear on the walls of the exhibition, with their overlapping colors and artistic styles are evident in the art pieces.

name: Dirab Golf and Country Club
description:
Dirab Golf & Country Club offers a challenging championship golf course, measuring an impressive 7280 yards from the black tees. The course, which is situated within the Tawfiq Valley, offers a variety of undulating fairways, elevated tee boxes and tree-lined fairways to truly test golfers of all abilities.
The course’s spectacular backdrop and practice facilities make Dirab Golf & Country Club one of the most desirable facilities in Saudi Arabia.

name: Spago
description:
Step into the heart of California this summer our exclusive summer lunch and dinner set menu
invites you to experience the best of Wolfgang Puck’s creations at a skinny price

name: A.O.K Kitchen
description: A true all-occasion dining destination, A.O.K. Riyadh will cater to breakfast, lunch, and dinner throughout the day. From the freshly prepared Acai Bowls and fluffy gluten free Blueberry Pancakes for breakfast, to the delicious Seabass Ceviche and homemade gluten free Gnocchi served later in the day, A.O.K Riyadh’s diverse menu will have something for everyone.

name: BillyBeez- AlQasr
description: Billy Beez is an ultimate indoor entertainment playground in mall settings, for kids aged 3-12 years offering a variety of features, from slides of trampolines, tunnels of towers. It is one of a kind soft play adventure land that sets of the standard in providing safe, healthy and most important providing fun, entertainment for children and family bonding.

name: Dr.  Sulaiman Al Habib - Ar Rayyan Hospital
description: Al Rayan Hospital, accredited by the Joint Commission International, provides services in sports injury treatment and orthopedic care utilizing advanced surgical techniques and rehabilitation programs. Additionally, the hospital has earned accreditation in the field of bariatric surgery and diagnostics, reflecting the provision of high quality medical care.

name: Jazean
description:
Jazean café and experience center. Indulge in and celebrate the iconic flavor of our coffee while immersing yourself in the essence of Saudi hospitality. 

Jazean are not just rich in flavors – they are rich in Saudi identity. Taste generations of meticulous coffee farming, roasting and brewing in each sip of our signature Arabica from its homeland , blended with the best arabica from around the world.

name: Riyadh Zoo
description: A visit to the zoo in a foreign country can be extremely gratifying as few language skills are needed — just an appreciation for animals. And the Riyadh Zoo is no exception. It is home to more than 1,300 animals from 190 species, which live in six protected areas. To find it, simply head to the Al Malaz neighborhood of Riyadh, and be sure to book your tickets ahead of time.

name: Noug
description: Capitalizing on the widespread popularity of Noug and its products in Riyadh, the brand has secured a prominent presence in the bustling heart of prosperity and entertainment: Boulevard City, one of the largest areas within the Riyadh Season. This strategic placement aims to enhance visitors' experiences, offering them a delightful journey filled with enjoyment and satisfaction.

name: Mr. Chow
description: Mr. Chow Riyadh invites guests to embark on a personalized culinary voyage, savoring the exquisite Chinese flavors and textures crafted by Executive Chef Jia He

name: Joe & The Juice
description: Joe & the Juice is a trendy and innovative juice bar and café chain known for its dedication to high-quality, natural ingredients and a vibrant atmosphere. In addition to a variety of freshly pressed juices and coffee drinks, Joe & the Juice offers a selection of delicious sandwiches, salads, and vegan options.

name: Farmer’s Day
description: Farmer’s Day is the name of a marketplace where Saudi farmers meet to display their crops. It is an old, popular marketplace famous for the local fresh land crops and products that farmers sell denoting the good quality and abundance of local productions. Farmer's Day is the perfect place for lovers of rural atmospheres and popular markets.

name: Bob's Famous- Park avenue
description: Bob’s Famous is a restaurant and bowling center rolled up in a fun retro style concept for the whole family. It features multiple food and beverages, bowling lanes, easy automatic scoring, bumper lanes, rest areas and much more. Suitable for all ages and skill levels. Whether you want to eat, bowl, or just chill with your friends, Bob’s famous is the ideal hangout for you.

name: VIA Riyadh
description: Designed in the Salmani style, this complex features a five-star hotel, a luxury cinema, shops, restaurants and food.

name: Madeo
description: Experience the taste of Tuscany! Transport yourself to the sun-soaked hills of Italy with our exclusive summer set menu, offering the authentic Madeo experience at an attractive price

name: Yoga And Hiking Trip At King Khalid Reserve
description: Enjoy a special trip full of adventures and festive entertainment activities. Immerse yourself in a quiet and relaxing atmosphere while hiking among the mountains and picturesque nature, and relax with enjoyable yoga sessions.

name: Tour in Riyadh: Explore Historical Diriyah And King Abdullah Financial District (KAFD) + Dinner
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey to Saudi Arabia's rich and storied past before transporting you to its futuristic present. Gather at the meeting point and head to Diriyah, located northwest of Riyadh, surrounded by the picturesque Wadi Hanifa. It was the original home of the Saudi royal family, and a thriving social and political hub. Tour At-Turaif District, a UNESCO World Heritage Site boasting Saudi Arabian architecture and cultural heritage, which offers a glimpse into the country's imperial history with its unique designs and splendid squares. Relish a lip-smacking traditional dinner before heading to King Abdullah Financial District (KAFD), Riyadh's modern interface for finance and business, home to skyscrapers, parks, museums and more. Take a refreshing stroll around the KAFD park and enjoy the stunning greenery while soaking in the vibrant atmosphere of this urban masterpiece.

name: Traditional Culinary Cooking Class in Riyadh
description: Enjoy a hands-on cooking class where culinary traditions of Saudi Arabia are showcased in a professional kitchen through live demonstrations & iconic recipes. Prepare the dishes under the supervision of the chef who will guide you every step of the way.

name: Travel Through Time In Shaqra & Ushaiger
description: Embark on a fascinating journey into the heart of Saudi Arabia's rich heritage and culture in this remarkable day trip to two of Saudi Arabia's historic towns, Shaqra and Ushaiger. Located about 200 kilometres northwest of Riyadh, these towns offer a glimpse into the traditional way of life in the Najd region that has shaped their regional customs. Your journey will begin with a tour of Al Qasab Village, a historic landmark, before you check out the Heritage Village in Shaqra and Hlewa Heritage Market. Stroll through the narrow streets and admire the mudbrick houses, mosques, and shops. Connect with friendly locals and learn about their lifestyle. Enjoy a traditional Saudi Arabian meal in Shaqra before setting out on a short drive to the next destination, Ushaiger. Begin your tour with a visit to the Al Salem Museum, which houses a vast collection of artefacts and exhibits that tell the story of Ushaiger's rich history. Next, explore the Ushaiger Heritage Village and be transported back in time and get an insight into the slow-paced Najdi society. Walk around the winding alleyways and look inside some of the empty houses before heading back to Riyadh.

name: Safari & Wildlife Park Tour in Riyadh
description: Every wildlife enthusiast's dream come true, this adventure-packed day tour is not to be missed! Just a short drive away from Riyadh, the Nofa Wildlife Park is home to a diverse variety of animals. You can find around 700 exotic species of animals including zebra, wildebeest, hippo, giraffe and cheetahs. Your day tour will begin with an exciting safari on a roofless 4x4 car that will take you through the beautiful vistas of the park. As you get busy with enjoying the scenic beauty, you will also catch wild animals go about their lives. Once you are done with the safari, you can head to the Visitor's park & enjoy a delicious meal. You can unwind at the park & try your hand at recreational activities that are available at the park. Head back to Riyadh & conclude your tour.

name: Safari Tour in Riyadh Desert
description: Once you arrive, you will board a specially designed 4x4 vehicle that will take you deep into the heart of the desert. The experienced driver will navigate the rugged terrain, allowing you to witness the beauty of the desert and its unique wildlife up close.

name: Set off On A Camping Adventure In Riyadh
description: Embark on an exhilarating desert adventure, combining the thrill of dune bashing, the serenity of camping, and exciting games and activities. Set off on a scenic drive to your campsite as you marvel at the vast expanse of the desert that unfolds before you, a canvas of golden sands and shifting dunes. Upon arrival at the camp in the Thumama National Park, settle in and have your guide take you through an orientation session to get you acquainted with your surroundings and the exciting activities that await. Warm up and prepare for an afternoon of adrenaline-pumping adventures. Dune bash across the stunning landscape aboard the Jeep Wrangler. Challenge your travel companions to a water war and glide down undulating dunes on a sandboard. You can also try your hand at horse riding, archery, shooting and Volleyball. Get ready for a satisfying traditional meal at the camp, where you can fuel yourself up for a fun round of board games and try bubble ball. Bask in your peaceful surroundings before it is time to say goodbye. Prepare for the journey to the pickup point with many pictures of all the unforgettable memories you've made on your desert adventure.

name: Stargazing in The Desert
description:
After approximately one hour’s drive from the city of Riyadh, we arrive at an area with sandstone hills where we start our hike, exploring a trail that offers glimpses of the past, when people used to rely on groundwater and build fences with rocks to protect their livestock. Depending on the season we may meet and have the chance to speak to some Bedouin camel herders . Before sunset we enjoy dinner around a bonfire, which offers an opportunity to hear some of the Saudi stories, before we start our gazing into the sky to marvel at the constellations. We provide historical insights about the region and traditions of tribal society before we return to Riyadh.
Start Time : 16:00H
End Time : 21:00H

name: Old Riyadh Tour & Sky Bridge
description:
We proceed into old Riyadh, starting in the downtown area, and visiting the traditional Dirah Souq (famous for buying antique carpets and other useful Saudi heritage antiques). The walk is infused with the aromas of sandalwood fragrance and other scents of the Orient. The Souq is known for men’s clothing and it is entertaining to watch the auction which takes place every Friday. After this, we visit the Masmak Fort which is just walking distance from the Old Souq and whose importance is linked to the creation of the 3rd Saudi Kingdom, the modern one we live in. The fortified palace was built during the reign of Abdullah bin Rashid in the year 1895 A.D. to serve as a military garrison for the army of Abdullah bin Rashid. His Majesty King Abdulaziz, the father of today’s nation, captured the fort in 1902, marking the beginning of the reconquest of Arabia by the House of Saudi. From there we will head to the famous Kingdom Tower and its Sky Bridge to see Riyadh from a panoramic viewpoint nearly 300 meters above the city. 

Start Time : 14h30
End Time : 19h30

name: Overnight In A Desert Camp Experience
description:
Join us for an overnight desert camp experience in Riyadh. Experience Highlights:
- Dune Bashing: Thrilling off-road adventure in a 4x4 vehicle.
- Camel Ride: Explore the desert on a camel.
- Sandboarding: Slide down the majestic sand dunes.
- Sunset Views: Enjoy a magical sunset over the desert.
- Traditional Hospitality: Savor Saudi coffee, tea, and dates.
Evening Activities:
- BBQ Dinner: Delicious BBQ dinner under the stars.
- Stargazing: Relax and gaze at the starry night sky.
- Campfire: Gather around a cozy campfire.
- Overnight Stay:
- Traditional Tent: Spend the night in a traditional Saudi tent.
- Comfortable Setup: Includes pillows, sleeping bags, and blankets.
- Morning Breakfast: Wake up to a traditional breakfast.
Details:
Duration: Approximately 17 hours (3:00 PM to 8:00 AM).
Pickup/Drop-off: From your location in Riyadh.
Additional Activities: Options for quad biking, sand skiing, and more.
This adventure is perfect for those looking to immerse themselves in the beauty and tranquility of the Riyadh desert. "

name: Red Sand Adventures
description: Our adventure begins with reception and departure from Riyadh, We then visit and explore the red sands through four-wheel drive vehicles. Afterwards,  we will take a simple hike to explore the place and ride on quad bikes and explore for 30-45 minutes. We will also enjoy a tour by riding Arabian camels. Finally, we will return to Riyadh.

name: Half Day Diriyah Tour
description: We drive for 30 minutes to Ad-Diriyah, located on the western bank of the Wadi Hanifah, a dry riverbed where water flows only after big rains. Ad-Diriyah used to be the capital of the Najd (the central plateau of the Arabian Peninsula) from the 15th century until the beginning of the 18th century. It is the birthplace of the first Saudi Kingdom and its importance in the history of the Arabian Peninsula was highlighted when it was listed as UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 2010, as the most brilliant example of Najdi architecture. The history of Ad-Diriyah goes back thousands of years as it was on an ancient trade and pilgrimage route, acting as a meeting point for those travelling to or from Asia, Africa and Europe. Our visit to the site allows us to admire its incredible architecture before returning to downtown Riyadh. As we drive towards the city , we have the opportunity to admire the rapid development of this cosmopolitan capital.

name: Half Day Riyadh City Tour
description:
We proceed into old Riyadh, starting in the downtown area, and visiting the traditional Dirah Souq (famous for buying antique carpets and other useful Saudi heritage antiques). The walk is infused with the aromas of sandalwood fragrance and other scents of the Orient. The Souq is known for men’s clothing and it is entertaining to watch the auction which takes place every Friday. After this, we visit the Masmak Fort which is just walking distance from the Old Souq and whose importance is linked to the creation of the 3rd Saudi Kingdom, the modern one we live in. The fortified palace was built during the reign of Abdullah bin Rashid in the year 1895 A.D. to serve as a military garrison for the army of Abdullah bin Rashid. His Majesty King Abdulaziz, the father of today’s nation, captured the fort in 1902, marking the beginning of the reconquest of Arabia by the House of Saudi. 
Start Time : 08:30H
End Time : 13:30H

name: Hike & Bike Experience In Riyadh
description:
Hiking and biking in the mountains of Riyadh offers a unique experience that allows skiers and climbers to explore the beauty of nature while challenging themselves physically. The mountains of Riyadh are known for their stunning and attractive scenery that attracts many sports enthusiasts and adventurers.
Hiking involves walking in nature on long and challenging trails in the mountains. This sport includes physical challenges such as climbing rough terrain and walking on rocks. Hiking is suitable for those who want to improve their physical fitness and explore nature at the same time.
Biking, on the other hand, involves mountain biking on rough roads and mountainous terrain, and includes challenges such as climbing and descending, and controlling the bike on rocks and rough terrain. Biking is suitable for those who love challenges, excitement, and the desire to improve their physical fitness.
Sports enthusiasts can enjoy practicing these sports in many mountainous areas in Riyadh, such as Hanifa Valley, Namir Valley, and Tuwaiq Mountain. The mountains in Riyadh provide a variety of trails and terrain for practicing these sports, ranging from easy trails to the most challenging and rugged mountain terrain.
It is recommended to wear the necessary protective gear while practicing hiking and biking, such as helmets, gloves, and protective armor, to avoid injuries in case of falling or shocks.
In addition to enjoying nature and physical challenges, hiking and biking provide an opportunity to relax and get away from the hustle and bustle of the city, as well as an opportunity to contemplate and meditate on the beauty ofnature. The mountains of Riyadh are an ideal place to practice these sports and enjoy a unique and unforgettable experience.

name: Hiking Experience at Darb Almanjour Trail - Riyadh
description: Hiking experience at Darb Al Manjour Trail - Enjoyable and breathtaking experience ends with amazing sundown view at the top of Al Manjour area. Break your daily routine and do something more passionate, more exciting along with hiking expert team. Enjoy the grouping stories telling and have some snack at the end of the day.

name: Full Day Riyadh City Tour
description: We start our tour of Riyadh by visiting the primary custodian of the Saudi national heritage and culture, the National Museum. Today it is a place of learning and discovery that hosts a unique collection of artefacts and covers the whole history of the Arabian Peninsula up to the modern era. After this, we continue to the nearby Murrabba Palace that used to be the royal residence where King Abdulaziz hosted his court. The palace was named after its square 40 by 40 meters shape and is now one of the city’s major museums. Adjacent to the palace, a modern building hosts a collection of King Abdulaziz’s personal items that we will briefly tour. These places are at the heart of the birth of the Saudi nation. Lunch in the city .In the afternoon we delve further into old Riyadh by going to the downtown area, visiting the old “Souq” the Dirah Souq famous for buying antique carpets and other useful Saudi heritage antiques, while walking we will always smell sandal wood fragrance and the scents or orient. The Souq is known for men’s clothing and one of the entertainments is to watch the auction which takes place on every Friday. Then we will visit the Masmak Fort which is just walking distance from the Old Souq and whose importance is linked to the creation of the 3rd Saudi Kingdom, the modern one we live in. The fortified palace was built during the reign of Abdullah bin Rashid in the year 1895 A.D. to serve as military garrison for the Abdullah bin Rashid army. His Majesty King Abdulaziz, the father of the today’s nation, captured the fort in 1902, marking the beginning of the reconquest of Arabia by the House of Saud. From there we will head to the famous Kingdom Tower and its Sky Bridge to see Riyadh from a panoramic viewpoint nearly 300 meters above the city.

name: Full Day Trip: Explore Ancient Mysteries of Central Arabia
description:
After a one-hour drive out of Riyadh, we will visit the most famous ancient carving site of Riyadh Province called Musayqirah (which is also known as Graffiti Rock 1). There, people carved texts and drawing of animals and humans which date back up to 8000 years. After another hour of driving, we will explore some wadis surprisingly full of trees and surrounded by mountains where we have found more fascinating carvings on the rocks that we will reveal to you. They tell us about the history of Central Arabia over few millennia, from the ancient time of Green Arabia until the frankincense trade and the conquests by Arabian tribes. We will stop for lunch on the way (packet lunch will be provided). We will continue our tour to a unique site with long ancient texts carved by the Kings of Sheeba which we would decipher for you. After admiring that marvelous site, we head back to Riyadh.
Suggested Start : 08:00H
Expected End Time : 20:00H

name: Guided Horseback Riding Tour
description: horseback riding adventures in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. This captivating activity offers an unforgettable way to explore the diverse and stunning landscapes surrounding the city. Our guided horseback riding tours in Riyadh cater to all skill levels, creating a unique and memorable experience for both first-time riders and seasoned equestrians.

name: Experience Local Home Traditional Saudi Culinary in Riyadh
description:
Enjoy the Saudi Arabian hospitality in a local house on this fantastic tour. Embrace Saudi culture that takes you closer to the heritage of the Kingdom. 
Start your day tour by savoring authentic Saudi coffee & dates in a local house. Grab an amazing opportunity to learn how to make traditional Saudi coffee & relish different kinds of dates, appetizers & salads. 
Feast on the main course of Jareesh & Kabsa and round it off with the popular dessert Mahalabia.

name: Experience Traditional Saudi Hospitality In Riyadh
description:
Experience the magic of the Arabian desert on a day trip from Riyadh to a local desert camp. Get picked up from your hotel or a meeting point in central Riyadh and get transported to the desert, where you can marvel at the unique landscapes and immerse yourself in the traditional local culture. 

Enjoy the warm hospitality of a team of local guides who will showcase their traditional way of life, culinary expertise, and artisanal crafts. Relish a delicious cup of Saudi coffee and listen to the soothing twang of the Nijr, a coffee grinding tool, and watch how this magical brew is made. 

Try on traditional garments, put on some henna and get a closer at how the camels are taken care of for a more immersive experience. Learn more about falconry under the guidance of an experienced falconer. Get more insight into this ancient art and witness the incredible skills of these majestic birds. 

Savor authentic local cuisine while enjoying traditional music, and enjoy snacks as your hosts regale you with marvelous stories and legends.

name: Explore Saudi Heritage In Riyadh
description: Embark on a unique adventure where you will get a chance to explore and visit top attractions in Riyadh that showcase the rich cultural heritage of Saudi Arabia. Start by embarking on a guided tour of the splendid Al Masmak Fortress, one of the most important landmarks of Saudi heritage. Previously an armoury, the site is now a heritage building. From the fortress, walk to Souq Al Zal, a traditional marketplace that preserves the spirit of old Arabia. You can check high-quality local products there, such as bukhoor, pottery, prayer beads, traditional wear like Abayas for women, and unique accessories like the Agal and Shemagh, a headdress worn by men. Visitors can try these on and take plenty of photos, and even walk back to Masmak Fortress to take pictures with this iconic landmark as your backdrop. Head to the spice shop in the souq to put your sense of smell to the test and get a chance to win amazing prizes. Visit the National Museum next, a part of the King Abdulaziz Historical Centre, which was established to showcase many important antiques, manuscripts and paintings from the bygone era. Head off to Najd Village, where you can enjoy authentic Najdi flavours in a traditional setting before calling it a day.

name: Dune Safari With Dinner
description:
Enjoy a safari trip with us that includes:

Thrilling dune bashing off-road experience in a 4x4.
Enjoy a camel ride.
Watch a stunning desert sunset.
Traditional Hospitality: Saudi coffee, tea, and dates.

Dinner Experience:
Delicious BBQ under the stars.
Relaxing ambiance candlelight dinner with music.

Details:
Duration: 7-9 hours.
Pickup/drop-off: from your hotel in Riyadh

name: Crossing the Empty Quarter - Um Alhesh Lake Trip
description:
One of the most thrilling tourist  adventures is crossing the Empty Quarter, covering a distance of approximately 1,200 kilometers within the sandy dunes. 

Starting from the northwestern part (Haradh) and passing through Umm Al-Hadid, all the way to the Heart of Baida Lahi in the southeastern part of the Empty Quarter you'll explore a variety of terrains in the region, including wells, oases, and sand dunes.
 
This journey spans seven days in the largest sandy desert in the world. Crossing the Empty Quarter is a once-in-a-lifetime experience that you will talk about for the rest of your life, and it will add your name to the list of the few who have crossed this beautiful area. 

The nights in the Empty Quarter are unlike any other place, you'll witness a sky filled with stars like never seen before and enjoy star gazing. The moonlit nights have their own enchanting charm as well.

name: Desert Safari With Camp Activities
description: A desert safari with camp activities offers an exhilarating and memorable experience in the vast and stunning desert landscapes. It combines thrilling adventures, cultural experiences, and relaxation in a desert camp setting.

name: Arts & Culture Tour in Riyadh
description: Start your tour with the Al-Faisal Museum for Arab-Islamic Art that pays a homage to the artistic heritage of Muslims. It is the perfect place to learn about the culture of Saudi Arabia and the Arab world at large. Make a pitstop at King Fahad National Library park to have lunch at one of the food stands that are known for whipping up tasty dishes. You will then head to Al Faisaliah Tower, the first skyscraper in Saudi Arabia's bustling capital, Riyadh, standing at 267-metre-high with 55 floors. Marvel at the views from the top and then make your way to The Globe for some snacks, as you take in the stunning views of Riyadh.

name: A Day of Excitement and Relaxation in the Heart of AdDahna
description:
Enjoy an unforgettable day in the golden sands of AdDahna Desert! Join us on AdDahna adventure, a day filled with exploration, fun, and relaxation in the heart of the desert.

Start your day with a warm welcome of Saudi coffee and dates, followed by an exciting tour in our 4×4 vehicles to explore the beauty and charm of AdDahna Desert. You’ll also have the chance to drive your own vehicle on the sand dunes for an exhilarating experience.

Savor a delicious lunch, test your skills in archery amidst nature, and unwind with a friendly game of volleyball on the desert sands with your family and friends.

This trip is designed to provide a day packed with enjoyable activities and unforgettable moments, all in a serene and peaceful atmosphere away from the city’s hustle and bustle. Whether you’re seeking adventure or simply want to spend quality time with loved ones, AdDahna adventure is the perfect choice for you and your group!

name: A One-Hour Hike in The Riyadh Desert
description:
Enjoy a one-hour hike in the serene Riyadh desert. Start your adventure with a short drive from the city, transitioning to the golden sands and unique rock formations. The trail is easy and suitable for all fitness levels, offering stunning views and a chance to spot local wildlife like desert lizards and birds.
Take a moment to rest and hydrate at the halfway point, soaking in the peaceful desert silence. The return journey provides a fresh perspective with changing light and shadows. By the end, you’ll feel refreshed and inspired by the natural beauty just outside Riyadh.

name: AdDahna: Your Retreat Amidst Nature and the Silence of the Dunes
description:
Enjoy a unique experience in the heart of AdDahana Desert with our exciting two-day, one-night adventure. Your journey begins upon your arrival at AdDahana Camp, where you will be welcomed with traditional tea and coffee.

Explore the stunning desert terrain with a local guide, and enjoy an exhilarating driving experience on the soft sands. Challenge your skills in archery and savor delicious Arabic dishes from our diverse meals.

In the evening, gather around the fire to share stories and enjoy stargazing under the desert sky.
